tile.text: When you first withdraw the scroll of parchment from your satchel the vendors face lights up with excitement, the glow quickly fades as he scans the text and finds it to be a simple advertisement, not an ancient spell or treasure map. He hands it back to you without a word

link.text: With a shrug you take the message and take another look your possessions
With a shrug you return the message to your bag and walk away from the stall
